class.name: b4j.example.bananokendoautocomplete
class.designerProperty: Key: AutoWidth, DisplayName: AutoWidth, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: False, Description: If set to true the widget automatically adjusts the width of the popup element and does not wrap up the item label.

Key: ClearButton, DisplayName: ClearButton, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Unless this options is set to false a button will appear when hovering the widget. Clicking that button will reset the widget's value and will trigger the change event.

Key: DataTextField, DisplayName: DataTextField, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The field of the data item used when searching for suggestions. This is the text that will be displayed in the list of matched results.
Key: Delay, DisplayName: Delay, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 200, Description: The delay in milliseconds between a keystroke and when the widget displays the suggestion popup.

Key: Enabled, DisplayName: Enabled, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: If set to false the widget will be disabled and will not allow user input. The widget is enabled by default and allows user input.

Key: EnforceMinLength, DisplayName: EnforceMinLength, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: False, Description: If set to true the widget will not show all items when the text of the search input cleared. By default the widget shows all items when the text of the search input is cleared. Works in conjunction with minLength.

Key: Filter, DisplayName: Filter, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: startswith, Description: The filtering method used to determine the suggestions for the current value. The default filter is "startswith" - all data items which begin with the current widget value are displayed in the suggestion popup.
Key: Height, DisplayName: Height, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 200, Description: The height of the suggestion popup in pixels. The default value is 200 pixels.
Key: HighlightFirst, DisplayName: HighlightFirst, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: If set to true the first suggestion will be automatically highlighted.

Key: IgnoreCase, DisplayName: IgnoreCase, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: If set to false case-sensitive search will be performed to find suggestions. The widget performs case-insensitive searching by default.

Key: MinLength, DisplayName: MinLength, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 1, Description: The minimum number of characters the user must type before a search is performed. Set to higher value than 1 if the search could match a lot of items.
Key: Placeholder, DisplayName: Placeholder, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The hint displayed by the widget when it is empty. Not set by default.
Key: Separator, DisplayName: Separator, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The character used to separate multiple values. Empty by default.
Key: Suggest, DisplayName: Suggest, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: False, Description: If set to true the widget will automatically use the first suggestion as its value.

Key: FixedGroupTemplate, DisplayName: FixedGroupTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the fixed header group. By default the widget displays only the value of the current group.

Key: FooterTemplate, DisplayName: FooterTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the footer template. The footer template receives the widget itself as a part of the data argument. Use the widget fields directly in the template.
Key: GroupTemplate, DisplayName: GroupTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the groups. By default the widget displays only the value of the group.

Key: NoDataTemplate, DisplayName: NoDataTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the "no data" template which will be displayed if no results are found or the underlying data source is empty. The noData template receives the widget itself as a part of the data argument. The template will be evaluated on every widget data bound.
Key: HeaderTemplate, DisplayName: HeaderTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Specifies a static HTML content, which will be rendered as a header of the popup element.
Key: Template, DisplayName: Template, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the items in the popup list.
Key: Classes, DisplayName: Classes, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Classes added to the HTML tag.
Key: Style, DisplayName: Style, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Styles added to the HTML tag.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _destroy
method.comment: Prepares the Widget for safe removal from DOM. Detaches all event handlers and removes jQuery.data attributes to avoid memory leaks. Calls destroy method of any child Kendo widgets.

method.name: _getname
method.comment: Gets the lowercased widget name

method.name: _setanimation
method.comment: Configures the opening and closing animations of the suggestion popup.

method.name: _setautowidth
method.comment: If set to true, the widget automatically adjusts the width of the popup element and does not wrap up the item label.

method.name: _setclearbutton
method.comment: Unless this options is set to false, a button will appear when hovering the widget. Clicking that button will reset the widget's value and will trigger the change event.

method.name: _setdatasource
method.comment: The data source of the widget which is used to display a list of values.

method.name: _setdatatextfield
method.comment: The field of the data item that provides the text content of the list items. The widget will filter the data source based on this field.

method.name: _setdelay
method.comment: Specifies the delay in milliseconds after which the MultiSelect will start filtering dataSource.

method.name: _setenabled
method.comment: If set to false the widget will be disabled and will not allow user input. The widget is enabled by default and allows user input.

method.name: _setenforceminlength
method.comment: If set to true the widget will not show all items when the text of the search input cleared. By default the widget shows all items when the text of the search input is cleared. Works in conjunction with minLength.

method.name: _setfilter
method.comment: The filtering method used to determine the suggestions for the current value. Filtration is turned of by default, and can be performed over string values only (either the widget's data has to be an array of strings, or over the field, configured in the dataTextField option). The supported filter values are 'startswith', 'endswith' and 'contains'.

method.name: _setheight
method.comment: The height of the suggestion popup in pixels. The default value is 200 pixels.

method.name: _sethighlightfirst
method.comment: If set to true the first suggestion will be automatically highlighted.

method.name: _setignorecase
method.comment: If set to false case-sensitive search will be performed to find suggestions. The widget performs case-insensitive searching by default.

method.name: _setminlength
method.comment: The minimum number of characters the user must type before a search is performed. Set to a higher value if the search could match a lot of items. A zero value means that a request will be made as soon as the user focuses the widget.

method.name: _setplaceholder
method.comment: The hint displayed by the widget when it is empty. Not set by default.

method.name: _setseparator
method.comment: The character used to separate multiple values. Empty by default.

method.name: _setsuggest
method.comment: If set to true the widget will automatically use the first suggestion as its value.

method.name: _setvalue
method.comment: Define the value of the widget

method.name: _setvalueprimitive
method.comment: Specifies the value binding behavior for the widget. If set to true the View-Model field will be updated with the selected item value field. If set to false, the View-Model field will be updated with the selected item.

class.name: b4j.example.bananokendomultiselect
class.designerProperty: Key: AutoBind, DisplayName: AutoBind, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: If set to false the widget will not bind to the data source during initialization. In this case data binding will occur when the change event of the data source is fired.
Key: AutoClose, DisplayName: AutoClose, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Controls whether to close the widget suggestion list on item selection.

Key: AutoWidth, DisplayName: AutoWidth, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: False, Description: If set to true the widget automatically adjusts the width of the popup element and does not wrap up the item label.

Key: ClearButton, DisplayName: ClearButton, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Unless this options is set to false a button will appear when hovering the widget. Clicking that button will reset the widget's value and will trigger the change event.

Key: DataTextField, DisplayName: DataTextField, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The field of the data item that provides the text content of the list items. The widget will filter the data source based on this field.
Key: DataValueField, DisplayName: DataValueField, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The field of the data item that provides the value of the widget.
Key: Delay, DisplayName: Delay, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 200, Description: Specifies the delay in milliseconds after which the MultiSelect will start filtering dataSource.

Key: Enabled, DisplayName: Enabled, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: If set to false the widget will be disabled and will not allow user input. The widget is enabled by default and allows user input.

Key: EnforceMinLength, DisplayName: EnforceMinLength, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: False, Description: If set to true the widget will not show all items when the text of the search input cleared. By default the widget shows all items when the text of the search input is cleared. Works in conjunction with minLength.

Key: Filter, DisplayName: Filter, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: startswith, List: startswith|endswith|contains, Description: The filtering method used to determine the suggestions for the current value. Filtration is turned of by default and can be performed over string values only (either the widget's data has to be an array of strings or over the field configured in the dataTextField option).
Key: Height, DisplayName: Height, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 200, Description: The height of the suggestion popup in pixels. The default value is 200 pixels.
Key: HighlightFirst, DisplayName: HighlightFirst, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: If set to true the first suggestion will be automatically highlighted.

Key: IgnoreCase, DisplayName: IgnoreCase, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: If set to false case-sensitive search will be performed to find suggestions. The widget performs case-insensitive searching by default.

Key: MaxSelectedItems, DisplayName: MaxSelectedItems, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 0, Description: Defines the limit of the selected items. If set to 0 widget will not limit number of the selected items.

Key: MinLength, DisplayName: MinLength, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 1, Description: The minimum number of characters the user must type before a search is performed. Set to a higher value if the search could match a lot of items. A zero value means that a request will be made as soon as the user focuses the widget.
Key: Placeholder, DisplayName: Placeholder, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The hint displayed by the widget when it is empty. Not set by default.
Key: TagMode, DisplayName: TagMode, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: multiple, List: multiple|single, Description: The mode used to render the selected tags.

Key: ValuePrimitive, DisplayName: ValuePrimitive, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: False, Description: Specifies the value binding behavior for the widget. If set to true the View-Model field will be updated with the selected item value field. If set to false the View-Model field will be updated with the selected item.

Key: FixedGroupTemplate, DisplayName: FixedGroupTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the fixed header group. By default the widget displays only the value of the current group.

Key: FooterTemplate, DisplayName: FooterTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the footer template. The footer template receives the widget itself as a part of the data argument. Use the widget fields directly in the template.
Key: GroupTemplate, DisplayName: GroupTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the groups. By default the widget displays only the value of the group.
Key: HeaderTemplate, DisplayName: HeaderTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Specifies a static HTML content, which will be rendered as a header of the popup element.
Key: ItemTemplate, DisplayName: ItemTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the items in the popup list.

Key: NoDataTemplate, DisplayName: NoDataTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the "no data" template which will be displayed if no results are found or the underlying data source is empty. method.comment: Controls whether to close the widget suggestion list on item selection. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/autoclose

method.name: _setdatasource
method.comment: The data source of the widget which is used to display a list of values. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/panelbar/configuration/datasource

method.name: _setdatatextfield
method.comment: The field of the data item that provides the text content of the list items. The widget will filter the data source based on this field. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/datatextfield

method.name: _setdatavaluefield
method.comment: The field of the data item that provides the value of the widget. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/datavaluefield

method.name: _setdelay
method.comment: Specifies the delay in milliseconds after which the MultiSelect will start filtering dataSource. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/delay

method.name: _setenabled
method.comment: If set to false the widget will be disabled and will not allow user input. The widget is enabled by default and allows user input. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/enable

method.name: _setenforceminlength
method.comment: If set to true the widget will not show all items when the text of the search input cleared. By default the widget shows all items when the text of the search input is cleared. Works in conjunction with minLength. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/enforceminlength

method.name: _setfilter
method.comment: The filtering method used to determine the suggestions for the current value. Filtration is turned of by default, and can be performed over string values only (either the widget's data has to be an array of strings, or over the field, configured in the dataTextField option). The supported filter values are 'startswith', 'endswith' and 'contains'. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/filter

method.name: _setheight
method.comment: The height of the suggestion popup in pixels. The default value is 200 pixels. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/height

method.name: _sethighlightfirst
method.comment: If set to true the first suggestion will be automatically highlighted. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/highlightfirst

method.name: _setignorecase
method.comment: If set to false case-sensitive search will be performed to find suggestions. The widget performs case-insensitive searching by default. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/ignorecase

method.name: _setmaxselecteditems
method.comment: Defines the limit of the selected items. If set to 0 the widget will not limit number of the selected items. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/maxselecteditems

method.name: _setminlength
method.comment: The minimum number of characters the user must type before a search is performed. Set to a higher value if the search could match a lot of items. A zero value means that a request will be made as soon as the user focuses the widget. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/minlength

method.name: _setplaceholder
method.comment: The hint displayed by the widget when it is empty. Not set by default. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/placeholder

method.name: _settagmode
method.comment: The mode used to render the selected tags. The available modes are: multiple - renders a tag for every selected value single - renders only one tag that shows the number of the selected values https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/tagmode

method.name: _setvalue
method.comment: Define the value of the widget https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/value

method.name: _setvalueprimitive
method.comment: Specifies the value binding behavior for the widget. If set to true the View-Model field will be updated with the selected item value field. If set to false, the View-Model field will be updated with the selected item. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/multiselect/configuration/valueprimitive

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _center
method.comment: Centers the window within the viewport.

method.name: _close
method.comment: Closes the Window.

method.name: _destroy
method.comment: Prepares the Widget for safe removal from DOM. Detaches all event handlers and removes jQuery.data attributes to avoid memory leaks. Calls destroy method of any child Kendo widgets.

method.name: _getname
method.comment: Gets the lowercased widget name

method.name: _ismaximized
method.comment: Indicates whether the window is maximized.

method.name: _isminimized
method.comment: Indicates whether the window is minimized.

method.name: _maximize
method.comment: Maximizes the Window to its title bar.

method.name: _minimize
method.comment: Minimizes the Window to its title bar.

method.name: _open
method.comment: Opens a Window and brings it on top of any other open Window instances by calling ToFront internally.

method.name: _pin
method.comment: Pins the Window at its current position with a position:fixed style, i.e. the widget stops moving together with the other page content when the page is scrolled. The user will still be able to move the Window with the mouse or keyboard.

method.name: _refresh
method.comment: refresh

method.name: _restore
method.comment: Restores a maximized or minimized Window to its previous state. Triggers the resize event.

method.name: _setcontent
method.comment: Gets or sets the content of the window.

method.name: _setdraggable
method.comment: Enables (true) or disables (false) the ability for users to move/drag the widget.

method.name: _setheight
method.comment: Gets or sets the height of the window.

method.name: _setmaxheight
method.comment: Gets or sets the max. height of the window.

method.name: _setmaxwidth
method.comment: Gets or sets the max. width of the window.

method.name: _setminheight
method.comment: Gets or sets the min. height of the window.

method.name: _setminwidth
method.comment: Gets or sets the min. width of the window.

method.name: _setshowtitle
method.comment: Show/Hide the window title bar If false, the window will be displayed without a title bar. Note that the window titlebar buttons will not be shown and this will prevent the window from being dragged unless dragHandle is configured.

method.name: _setstyle
method.comment: Gets or sets the CSS-Style of the window.

method.name: _settitle
method.comment: The text in the window title bar.

method.name: _setwidth
method.comment: Gets or sets the width of the window.

method.name: _tofront
method.comment: Increases the z-index style of a Window wrapper to bring the instance on top of other open Windows. This method is executed automatically when the open method is used.

method.name: _togglemaximization
method.comment: Toggles the Window between a maximized and restored state. Triggers the resize event.

method.name: _unpin
method.comment: Disables the Window's pinned state, so that the widget will move together with the other page content when the page is scrolled.

method.comment: Specifies the formats which are used to parse the value set with value() method or by direct input. If not set the value of the options.format and options.timeFormat will be used. class.designerProperty: Key: DataTextField, DisplayName: DataTextField, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The field of the data item that provides the text content of the list items. The widget will filter the data source based on this field.
Key: DataValueField, DisplayName: DataValueField, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The field of the data item that provides the value of the widget.

Key: Filter, DisplayName: Filter, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: none, List: none|startswith|endswith|contains, Description: The filtering method used to determine the suggestions for the current value.
Key: Delay, DisplayName: Delay, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 500, Description: Specifies the delay in milliseconds before the search-text typed by the end user is sent for filtering.

Key: AutoWidth, DisplayName: AutoWidth, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: False, Description: If set to true the widget automatically adjusts the width of the popup element and does not wrap up the item label.
Key: AutoBind, DisplayName: AutoBind, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Controls whether to bind the widget to the data source on initialization.

Key: IgnoreCase, DisplayName: IgnoreCase, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: If set to false case-sensitive search will be performed to find suggestions. The widget performs case-insensitive searching by default.
Key: Suggest, DisplayName: Suggest, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: False, Description: If set to true the widget will automatically use the first suggestion as its value.
Key: Placeholder, DisplayName: Placeholder, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The hint displayed by the widget when it is empty. Not set by default.

Key: FixedGroupTemplate, DisplayName: FixedGroupTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the fixed header group. By default the widget displays only the value of the current group.
Key: FooterTemplate, DisplayName: FooterTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the footer template.
Key: GroupTemplate, DisplayName: GroupTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the groups. By default the widget displays only the value of the group.

Key: NoDataTemplate, DisplayName: NoDataTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the "no data" template, which will be displayed if no results are found or the underlying data source is empty.
Key: HeaderTemplate, DisplayName: HeaderTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Specifies a static HTML content, which will be rendered as a header of the popup element.

Key: Template, DisplayName: Template, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the items. By default the widget displays only the text of the data item (configured via dataTextField).
Key: Classes, DisplayName: Classes, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Classes added to the HTML tag.
Key: Style, DisplayName: Style, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Styles added to the HTML tag.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _add
method.comment: Appends a data item to the data source. Example: myDataSource.Add(CreateMap("name": "Jane Doe", "age": "30")) myDataSource.Add(CreateMap("name": "John Doe", "age": "33")) Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/methods/add

method.name: _aggregates
method.comment: Returns the aggregate results. Example: Dim ageAggregate As Map = myDataSource.Aggregates("age") Log(ageAggregate.Get("sum")) Log(ageAggregate.Get("min")) Log(ageAggregate.Get("max")) Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/methods/aggregate#aggregates

method.name: _at
method.comment: Returns the data item at the specified index. The index is zero-based. <link>Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/methods/at</link>

method.name: _getbyuid
method.comment: Gets the data item (model) with the specified uid. <link>Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/methods/getbyuid</link>

method.name: _read
method.comment:
Reads data items from a remote/custom transport (if the transport option is set) or from a JavaScript array (if the data option is set).
<link>Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/methods/read</link>

method.name: _remove
method.comment:
Removes the specified data item from the data source.
<link>Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/methods/remove</link>

method.name: _setaggregate
method.comment: Gets or sets the aggregate configuration. Example: Dim myAggregateList As List myAggregateList.Initialize myAggregateList.Add(CreateMap("field": "age", "aggregate": "sum")) myAggregateList.Add(CreateMap("field": "age", "aggregate": "min")) myAggregateList.Add(CreateMap("field": "age", "aggregate": "max")) myDataSource.Aggregate = myAggregateList Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/methods/aggregate

method.name: _setdata
method.comment: Gets or sets the data items of the data source. Example: Dim myDataList As List myDataList.Initialize myDataList.Add(CreateMap("name": "Jane Doe", "age": 30)) myDataList.Add(CreateMap("name": "John Doe", "age": 33)) myDataSource.Data = myDataList Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/methods/data

method.name: _setfilter
method.comment: Gets or sets the filter configuration. Example: Dim FilterMap As Map = CreateMap("field":"name", "operator":"startsWith", "value":"Jane") myDataSource.Filter = FilterMap Dim View As List = myDataSource.View For Counter = 0 To View.Size - 1 Log(View.Get(Counter)) Next The supported values for 'operator' are: "eq" (equal to) "neq" (not equal to) "isnull" (is equal to null) "isnotnull" (is not equal to null) "lt" (less than) "lte" (less than or equal to) "gt" (greater than) "gte" (greater than or equal to) "startswith" "doesnotstartwith" "endswith" "doesnotendwith" "contains" "doesnotcontain" "isempty" "isnotempty" Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/methods/filter#filter

method.name: _setgroup
method.comment: Gets or sets the grouping configuration. Example: myDataSource.Add(CreateMap("text":"Tea", "category":"Beverages")) myDataSource.Add(CreateMap("text":"Coffee", "category":"Beverages")) myDataSource.Add(CreateMap("text":"Ham", "category":"Food")) myDataSource.Group = CreateMap("field":"category") Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/methods/group#group

method.name: _setpage
method.comment:
The page of data which the data source will return when the view method is invoked or request from the remote service.
<link>Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/configuration/page</link>

method.name: _setpagesize
method.comment:
The number of data items per page. The property has no default value. Therefore, to use paging, make sure some pageSize value is set.
<link>Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/configuration/pagesize</link>

method.name: _setsort
method.comment: Example: Dim SortMap As Map = CreateMap("field":"age", "dir":"desc") myDataSource.Sort = SortMap Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/methods/sort

method.name: _settransport
method.comment:
The configuration used to load and save the data items. A data source is remote or local based on the way it retrieves data items. Remote data sources load and save data items from and to a remote end-point (also known as remote service or server). The transport option describes the remote service configuration - URL, HTTP verb, HTTP headers, and others. The transport option can also be used to implement custom data loading and saving. Local data sources are bound to a JavaScript array via the data option.
<link>Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/configuration/transport/link>

method.name: _sync
method.comment:
Saves any data item changes.
<link>Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/methods/sync</link>

method.name: _view
method.comment:
Returns the data items which correspond to the current page, filter, sort, and group configuration.
<link>Kendo UI Documentation|https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/data/datasource/methods/view</link>

class.name: b4j.example.bananokendoslider
class.designerProperty: Key: IncreaseButtonTitle, DisplayName: Increase button title, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: Increase, Description: The title of the increase button of the Slider.
Key: DecreaseButtonTitle, DisplayName: Decrease button title, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: Decrease, Description: The title of the decrease button of the Slider.
Key: DragHandleTitle, DisplayName: Drag handle title, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: Drag, Description: The title of the drag handle of the Slider.
Key: Min, DisplayName: Minimum value, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 0, Description: The minimum value of the Slider.
Key: Max, DisplayName: Maximum value, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 10, Description: The maximum value of the Slider.
Key: Orientation, DisplayName: Orientation, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: horizontal, Description: The orientation of a Slider., List: horizontal|vertical
Key: ShowButtons, DisplayName: Show buttons, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Can be used to show (true) or hide (false) the increase and decrease buttons of a Slider.

Key: LargeStep, DisplayName: Large step, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 5, Description: The delta with which the value will change when the user presses the Page Up or Page Down key (the drag handle must be focused). Note: largeStep will also set a large tick for every large step. Must be a positive number, larger than smallStep.

Key: SmallStep, DisplayName: Small step, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 1, Description: The small step value of the Slider. Must be a positive number. Otherwise an Javascript exception will be thrown. The small step value determines the amount of Slider value change when the end user clicks on the increase or decrease buttons of the Slider; presses the arrow keys (the drag handle must be focused); drags the drag handle.
Key: TickPlacement, DisplayName: Tick placement, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: both, Description: Denotes the location of the tick marks in the Slider., List: topLeft|bottomRight|both|none
Key: TooltipEnabled, DisplayName: Tooltip enabled, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Disables (false) or enables (true) the tooltip of the Slider.

Key: TooltipFormat, DisplayName: Tooltip format, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Format string for the text of the tooltip. Note: The applied format will also influence the appearance of the Slider tick labels. The slider widget supports precision of up-to 10 digits after the decimals point.

Key: TooltipTemplate, DisplayName: Tooltip template, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Template of the tooltip. The following variables are passed by the Slider and are ready to be used inside the template: value - the current value when using a regular slider and: selectionStart and selectionEnd - the current values when using a range slider
Key: Value, DisplayName: Value, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 0, Description: The underlying value of the Slider.
Key: Enabled, DisplayName: Enabled, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Enable/Disable the Slider widget.
Key: Classes, DisplayName: Classes, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Classes added to the HTML tag.
Key: Style, DisplayName: Style, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Styles added to the HTML tag.

class.name: b4j.example.bananokendonumerictextbox
class.designerProperty: Key: Culture, DisplayName: Culture, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Specifies the culture info used by the widget. Default: "en-US". Note: add .../cultures/kendo.culture.[culture].min.js to your projekt!
Key: Decimals, DisplayName: Decimals, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 0, Description: Specifies the number precision applied to the widget value and when the NumericTextBox is focused.

Key: Factor, DisplayName: Factor, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 1, Description: Specifies the factor by which the value is multiplied. The obtained result is used as edit value. So if 15 as string is entered in the NumericTextBox and the factor value is set to 100 the visual value will be 1500. On blur the visual value will be divided by 100 thus scaling the widget value to the original proportion.
Key: Format, DisplayName: Format, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Specifies the number format used when the widget is not focused. Any valid number format is allowed.
Key: Min, DisplayName: Min, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 0, Description: Specifies the smallest value the user can enter.
Key: Max, DisplayName: Max, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 100, Description: Specifies the largest value the user can enter.
Key: Placeholder, DisplayName: Placeholder, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The hint displayed by the widget when it is empty. Not set by default.

Key: RestrictDecimals, DisplayName: RestrictDecimals, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: False, Description: Specifies whether the decimals length should be restricted during typing. The length of the fraction is defined by the decimals value.

Key: Round, DisplayName: Round, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Specifies whether the value should be rounded or truncated. The length of the fraction is defined by the decimals value.
Key: Spinners, DisplayName: Spinners, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Specifies whether the up and down spin buttons should be rendered
Key: Step, DisplayName: Step, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 1, Description: Specifies the value used to increment or decrement widget value.
Key: UpArrowText, DisplayName: UpArrowText, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Specifies the text of the tooltip on the up arrow.
Key: DownArrowText, DisplayName: DownArrowText, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Specifies the text of the tooltip on the down arrow.
Key: Value, DisplayName: Value, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 0, Description: Specifies the value of the NumericTextBox widget.
Key: Classes, DisplayName: Classes, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Classes added to the HTML tag.
Key: Style, DisplayName: Style, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Styles added to the HTML tag.

method.name: _setdecimals
method.comment:
Specifies the number precision applied to the widget value and when the NumericTextBox is focused. If not set, the precision defined by the current culture is used. If the user enters a number with a greater precision than is currently configured, the widget value will be rounded.
For example, if decimals is 2 and the user inputs 12.346, the value will become 12.35. If the user inputs 12.99, the value will become 13.00.

method.name: _setdownarrowtext
method.comment: Specifies the text of the tooltip on the down arrow.

method.name: _setfactor
method.comment: Specifies the factor by which the value is multiplied. The obtained result is used as edit value. So if 15 as string is entered in the NumericTextBox and the factor value is set to 100 the visual value will be 1500. On blur the visual value will be divided by 100 thus scaling the widget value to the original proportion.

class.designerProperty: Key: DataTextField, DisplayName: DataTextField, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The field of the data item that provides the text content of the list items. The widget will filter the data source based on this field.

Key: Filter, DisplayName: Filter, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: none, List: none|startswith|endswith|contains, Description: The filtering method used to determine the suggestions for the current value.
Key: Delay, DisplayName: Delay, FieldType: Int, DefaultValue: 500, Description: Specifies the delay in milliseconds before the search-text typed by the end user is sent for filtering.

Key: AutoWidth, DisplayName: AutoWidth, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: False, Description: If set to true the widget automatically adjusts the width of the popup element and does not wrap up the item label.
Key: AutoBind, DisplayName: AutoBind, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Controls whether to bind the widget to the data source on initialization.

Key: IgnoreCase, DisplayName: IgnoreCase, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: If set to false case-sensitive search will be performed to find suggestions. The widget performs case-insensitive searching by default.
Key: GroupTemplate, DisplayName: GroupTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the groups. By default the widget displays only the value of the group.

Key: FixedGroupTemplate, DisplayName: FixedGroupTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the fixed header group. By default the widget displays only the value of the current group.
Key: FooterTemplate, DisplayName: FooterTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the footer template.
Key: OptionLabelTemplate, DisplayName: OptionLabelTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the option label.
Key: HeaderTemplate, DisplayName: HeaderTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Specifies a static HTML content which will be rendered as a header of the popup element.

Key: Template, DisplayName: Template, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the items. By default the widget displays only the text of the data item (configured via dataTextField).

Key: ValueTemplate, DisplayName: ValueTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The valueTemplate used to render the selected value. By default the widget displays only the text of the data item (configured via dataTextField).

Key: NoDataTemplate, DisplayName: NoDataTemplate, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The template used to render the "no data" template, which will be displayed if no results are found or the underlying data source is empty.
Key: Height, DisplayName: Height, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: The height of the suggestion popup in pixels. The default value is 200 pixels.
Key: Classes, DisplayName: Classes, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Classes added to the HTML tag.
Key: Style, DisplayName: Style, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Styles added to the HTML tag.

method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.comment: Prepares the Widget for safe removal from DOM. Detaches all event handlers and removes jQuery.data attributes to avoid memory leaks. Calls destroy method of any child Kendo widgets.

method.name: _setfilter
method.comment: Gets/Sets the filter value The supported filter values are 'none', 'startswith', 'endswith' and 'contains'.

property.name: _filter
property.comment: Gets/Sets the filter value The supported filter values are 'none', 'startswith', 'endswith' and 'contains'.

property.name: _name
property.comment: Gets the lowercased widget name

Key: Reverse, DisplayName: Reverse, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: False, Description: Specifies if the progress direction will be reversed.

class.name: b4j.example.bananokendorangeslider
class.designerProperty: Key: LeftDragHandleTitle, DisplayName: Left drag handle title, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: Drag, Description: The title of the left drag handle of the Slider.
Key: RightDragHandleTitle, DisplayName: Right drag handle title, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: Drag, Description: The title of the right drag handle of the Slider.
Key: Min, DisplayName: Minimum value, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 0, Description: The minimum value of the Slider.
Key: Max, DisplayName: Maximum value, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 10, Description: The maximum value of the Slider.
Key: Orientation, DisplayName: Orientation, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: horizontal, Description: The orientation of a Slider., List: horizontal|vertical

Key: LargeStep, DisplayName: Large step, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 5, Description: The delta with which the value will change when the user presses the Page Up or Page Down key (the drag handle must be focused). Note: largeStep will also set a large tick for every large step. Must be a positive number, larger than smallStep.

Key: SmallStep, DisplayName: Small step, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 1, Description: The small step value of the Slider. Must be a positive number. Otherwise an Javascript exception will be thrown. The small step value determines the amount of Slider value change when the end user clicks on the increase or decrease buttons of the Slider; presses the arrow keys (the drag handle must be focused); drags the drag handle.
Key: TickPlacement, DisplayName: Tick placement, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: both, Description: Denotes the location of the tick marks in the Slider., List: topLeft|bottomRight|both|none
Key: TooltipEnabled, DisplayName: Tooltip enabled, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Disables (false) or enables (true) the tooltip of the Slider.

Key: TooltipFormat, DisplayName: Tooltip format, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Format string for the text of the tooltip. Note: The applied format will also influence the appearance of the Slider tick labels. The slider widget supports precision of up-to 10 digits after the decimals point.

Key: TooltipTemplate, DisplayName: Tooltip template, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Template of the tooltip. The following variables are passed by the Slider and are ready to be used inside the template: value - the current value when using a regular slider and: selectionStart and selectionEnd - the current values when using a range slider
Key: ValueStart, DisplayName: Start value, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 0, Description: The underlying start value of the Slider.
Key: ValueEnd, DisplayName: End value, FieldType: Float, DefaultValue: 0, Description: The underlying end value of the Slider.
Key: Enabled, DisplayName: Enabled, FieldType: Boolean, DefaultValue: True, Description: Enable/Disable the Slider widget.
Key: Classes, DisplayName: Classes, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Classes added to the HTML tag.
Key: Style, DisplayName: Style, FieldType: String, DefaultValue: , Description: Styles added to the HTML tag.

method.name: _getname
method.comment: Gets the lowercased widget name

method.name: _setanimation
method.comment: Configures the opening and closing animations of the popups. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/datetimepicker/configuration/animation

method.name: _setculture
method.comment: Specifies the culture info used by the widget. https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/api/javascript/ui/datetimepicker/configuration/culture

method.name: _setdates
method.comment: Specifies a list of dates which will be passed to the month template of the DateView. All dates which match the date portion of the selected date will be used to re-bind the TimeView.

method.name: _setdisabledates
method.comment: An array that will be used to determine which dates to be disabled for selection by the widget.

method.name: _setenabled
method.comment: Enable/Disable the widget.

method.name: _setformat
method.comment: https://docs.telerik.com/kendo-ui/framework/globalization/dateformatting

method.name: _setmax
method.comment: Specifies the maximum date, which the calendar can show. (default: Date(2099, 11, 31))

method.name: _setmin
method.comment: Specifies the minimum date that the calendar can show. (default: Date(1900, 0, 1))

method.name: _setparseformats
method.comment: Specifies the formats which are used to parse the value set with value() method or by direct input. If not set the value of the options.format and options.timeFormat will be used. Note that value of the format option is always used. The timeFormat value also will be used if defined.

method.comment: Gets / Sets the value of the widget

method.name: _setvisible
method.comment: Show/Hide the widget.
